hero.subtitle: Senior Software Engineer | Full Stack Developer
hero.bio: in designing, developing, and deploying scalable web applications and services using microfrontend and microservices architectures.

about.title: About Me
paragraphs: I'm a passionate Senior Associate L2 (Team Lead) at Publicis Sapient with extensive experience in building scalable web applications and leading development teams. My journey in tech has been marked by continuous growth, from intern to team lead, driven by a constant desire to learn and innovate.

Throughout my career at companies like Publicis Sapient, Daffodil Software, and Hasura, I've helped transform ideas into robust digital solutions for Fortune 500 clients. I specialize in full-stack development with expertise in React, Node.js, TypeScript, and cloud technologies, with a strong focus on enterprise-scale applications and digital transformation.

My achievements include receiving the Core Value Award at Publicis Sapient's Global Townhall 2024, being recognized as 'Solutioning Stars' and 'Process Orienter' at Daffodil Software. When I'm not coding, you'll find me mentoring team members, contributing to technical excellence initiatives, or exploring the latest tech trends. I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and creating exceptional user experiences.
